Date: 2024-11-20 15:08
Subject: Discover TruDoc, Let's Grow Our Retail Team Together, Introducing Haze, Sports Day Event, Global Opportunity: St Honore, Stella McCartney Sale, Swarovski X Cle d’Or & Internal Job Opportunties
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/550641/5C1BE342817FF2BFEAB0F6261B8DA9CB/join-us-to-discover-trudoc-services.jpeg> 	

DISCOVER TRUDOC: YOUR 24/7 HEALTHCARE PARTNER


Your wellbeing and health are at the heart of everything we do! That’s why we're partnering with TruDoc once again to help you access their invaluable services and offerings. Learn more about the services here. <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fdiscover-trudoc-your-24-7-healthcare-partner%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWV9W7LFMtxKPTBg32KO6%252bHdk4JwQtGIsZ7WyOdDtaTKXouzXSQs08wXAMkBFAa52ICgR94cVAjkY7Hm5qNXjNU90kthaClr5vTtLwXnCLepzgVXvBZyAb8%252fFmTjqnZPCZhxvHjZBdBNsHejyUGqEJcGAauLuybd945%252fysVzBEUXehkm7aTowtMXswoDCx5XlMUnOOGIYjlQrc6wGbh2TldAsiFE5fYCu3wQydt28s1iO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce84b0dcf4d7241c4d04108dd0953a359%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638676977018400533%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=XfEnJsILQ98PuqTv8ewwPyPpbri4ckDecONQvnn8nQw%3D&reserved=0>

chunks.text:
33%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=XfEnJsILQ98PuqTv8ewwPyPpbri4ckDecONQvnn8nQw%3D&reserved=0> 

Join us for two insightful webinars where you’ll discover how to make the most of TruDoc’s services through a live demonstration:

- Session 1: Tuesday 26th of November | 11AM to 11:30AM
- Session2: Wednesday 27th of November | 3PM to 3:30PM

Calendar invites will be sent out shortly!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/544527/EC71CDB837627227C5B1E3FED492ADBF/nuggets-05.png> 	

LET’S GROW OUR RETAIL TEAM TOGETHER

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/550592/F9A07C518750E1CC8D825191F5129304/image-2024-11-07t112621-427.jpeg> 	
We’re launching our new referral campaign for the Retail division, and we want you to be part of it! By referring great candidates, you can make a real impact on our team’s growth and help us build an even stronger retail team.

Here’s how you can help:
Think about your network and who could be a perfect fit for our retail department. Make a referral or share content to help us spread the word about working at Chalhoub Group. Remember, you can collect points and earn exciting rewards.

Ready to make a referral? Click here and help us build a great team!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/545072/F9670E75BFBEAD7654103D661CBD8759/nuggets-38.png> 	

INTRODUCING HAZE – OUR NEW HAIR & BODY MIST BRAND

Haze is the Group’s new minimalist hair & body mist brand that offers qualitative fragrances developed in the south of France, at an accessible price point.

chunks.text: Haze is the Group’s new minimalist hair & body mist brand that offers qualitative fragrances developed in the south of France, at an accessible price point. The brand has just launched across all Faces stores in KSA, UAE & Qatar with 5 different scents catered to the region. Discover Haze now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fintroducing-haze-the-new-hair-body-mist-brand-by-chalhoub-group%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWV9W7LFMtxKPTBg32KO6%252bHdk4JwQtGIsZ7WyOdDtaTKXouzXSQs08wXAMkBFAa52ICgR94cVAjkY7Hm5qNXjNU90kthaClr5vTtLwXnCLepzgVXvBZyAb8%252fFmTjqnZPCZhxvHjZBdBNsHejyUGqEJcGAauLuybd945%252fysVzBEUXehkm7aTowtMXswoDCx5XlMUnOOGIYjlQrc6wGbh2TldAsiFE5fYCu3wQydt28s1iO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce84b0dcf4d7241c4d04108dd0953a359%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638676977018454482%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=QD6OIgdaDgPj1GUl4EvtlPR89fg0uTBABMi8eKWPgQQ%3D&reserved=0> at a Faces store or online! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fwww.faces.ae%252fen%252fbrands%252fhaze%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWV9W7LFMtxKPTBg32KO6%252bHdk4JwQtGIsZ7WyOdDtaTKXouzXSQs08wXAMkBFAa52ICgR94cVAjkY7Hm5qNXjNU90kthaClr5vTtLwXnCLepzgVXvBZyAb8%252fFmTjqnZPCZhxvHjZBdBNsHejyUGqEJcGAauLuybd945%252fysVzBEUXehkm7aTowtMXswoDCx5XlMUnOOGIYjlQrc6wGbh2TldAsiFE5fYCu3wQydt28s1iO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce84b0dcf4d7241c4d04108dd0953a359%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638676977018469280%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=PwMnkXHf4cFeYZq%2Fd9kgCxFcZZAwqGCG%2BvyV8B4qFlc%3D&reserved=0>

JOIN US FOR ​SPORTS DAY ​EVENT WITH AJMAN DISABLED CLUB

Join us to honour diversity and inclusivity by contributing to building a stronger, united community. Get ready for a day filled with sports activities with over 25 People of Determination athletes and friendly matches!​ Tuesday, 10th December​ from 9am - 2pm at Ajman Disabled Club, Ajman

Sign up now! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fforms.office.com%252fr%252fY2pPCytCKR%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWV9W7LFMtxKPTBg32KO6%252bHdk4JwQtGIsZ7WyOdDtaTKXouzXSQs08wXAMkBFAa52ICgR94cVAjkY7Hm5qNXjNU90kthaClr5vTtLwXnCLepzgVXvBZyAb8%252fFmTjqnZPCZhxvHjZBdBNsHejyUGqEJcGAauLuybd945%252fysVzBEUXehkm7aTowtMXswoDCx5XlMUnOOGIYjlQrc6wGbh2TldAsiFE5fYCu3wQydt28s1iO&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ce84b0dcf4d7241c4d04108dd0953a359%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638676977018485504%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=nR%2BnSCB58ZSxl8%2B3e6G8GwmxjuFoRk74ZWG4ycl5m%2FE%3D&reserved=0>

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/544565/D0A16AB0334D873C70435BDA8B6ACE2B/nuggets-21.png> 	

GLOBAL OPPORTUNITY: ST HONORE IS HIRING

If you’re a fluent Spanish speaker with a passion for strategy, relationship-building, expertised in Fashion & scouting and willing to be based from Panama, this is for you! Our Business Development Manager role will be responsible for the implementation of business strategies that reflect foreign market opportunities, leading all research activities to identify target markets for growth, within a given country or area. Contact us if interested! <mailto:jorge.marco@chalhoub.com> 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/550643/9023D133DD0F1E4CA8671CBF10526B85/whatsapp-image-2024-11-19-at-1-18-43-pm.jpeg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/545526/AE0D1AEDA3479DE654F5D4977A5B0D71/nuggets-24.png> 	

STELLA MCCARTNEY 50% OFF AT DUBAI MALL

Discover timeless elegance with a flat 50% OFF select Stella McCartney pieces, starting Friday, November 22nd at our Dubai Mall Boutique.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/550644/AE16A915359CF7417D595B5F902D6717/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-56.gif>

SWAROVSKI X CLE D’OR

Swarovski hosted an exclusive VIP event at the Cle d’Or MOE luxury lounge, where guests had the opportunity to learn about Created Diamonds during a session with an IGI expert, followed by a Myriad crystallization workshop.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/550645/E44D46979126578AD660909A2D6BDC54/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-57.gif>

OUR LATEST INTERNAL JOB OPPORTUNITIES

Here are our hot jobs for this week:

- KSA | Sr Brand Executive
- KSA | Sr People Partner
- UAE | Driver
- UAE | Sr Manager, Cyber Security
- UAE National | HR Trainee

 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/u5UhA0Y2BkKEr9elAH6pFA/550093/02073091F1DE74E1F1B8A540801F3964/untitled-design-2024-06-27t121637-459.png>
